## Description
The **Deliver SMS **task allows to send SMS messages.

> Note

For more information on the structure of the input file, see: [XML Input File Structure for Doxee Platform 3 Native Tasks](/doxee-platform/docs/xml-input-file-structure-for-doxee-platform-3-native-tasks), section "SMS delivery".

## Configuration
**![](data:image/png;base64,)**

- In the **Alias **field, enter the name of the task that will be displayed in the workflow.

- Click on the **Resource **field and select the SMS Template resource to use.

> Note

For more information, see: [SMS Template Resource Reference](/doxee-platform/docs/sms-template-resource-reference).
